title: Real People
subtitle: Meet Our Team
byline: They work tirelessly behind the scenes to help you build better products and enhance consulting services. Together with independent contractors, we are committed to creating sustainable and scalable solutions, ensuring we bring the best team every time.

members.title: CEO and Managing Director
members.bio: As a CEO with an Enterprise Architect background, I champion teamwork and inclusion. My expertise fuels innovative IT solutions driving organizational growth and transformation.

members.title: Innovator & Enteprise Architect
members.bio: I'm a tech innovator obsessed with cutting-edge solutions. Quality, customer-centricity, and simplicity drive everything I do. Technology must be open, sustainable, and ethical.

members.title: Business Growth Manager
members.bio: I drive strategic growth and partnerships, expanding market reach, optimizing revenue, and fostering key client relationships. I thrive on creating opportunities and delivering results.

members.title: Cultural-Driven, Human-Centered Marketer
members.bio: With background in humanities, design, and digital marketing, I craft captivating brand stories, driving Inside View Global's vision.

members.title: Creative & Art Senior Manager
members.bio: Passionate about creating and directing designs, capturing IVG essence and sharing the messages through visual communication.

members.title: Senior Certified Solutions Architect
members.bio: Microsoft Enterprise and AWS certified, with a motto of "Promoting Organizational Transformation and Digital Innovation." As an Enterprise Architect, I concentrate on the current state and the roadmap to achieve the desired future state.

members.title: Senior Full Stack Software Engineer
members.bio: Creative Full Stack Developer with a passion for crafting seamless software solutions and extensive expertise in engineering.

members.title: Microsoft Senior Software Engineer
members.bio: Developing scalable software solutions with a track record of successful project delivery, I have expertise in all phases of the software development lifecycle, from concept through deployment and optimization.

members.title: Senior Microsoft Power Platform Consultant
members.bio: Driving digital transformation by harnessing the power of the Microsoft Power Platform, I analyze business requirements, design innovative solutions, and implement strategies that streamline operations, enhance productivity, and foster data-driven decision-making.
